0.title: 4X0LOTL
0.info-1: 4X0LOTL (Axolotl 40) is a first person action RPG in which you operate one of Earth's most advanced humanoid mech: The AX-40.
0.info-2: More information will be available once development begins (After Axolus).

1.title: Axolus
1.info-1: Axolus is a retro-inspired role playing game that features game mechanics inspired by classic MMORPGs.
1.info-2: You play as one of Saturn's intergalactic explorers on a long term mission to retrieve ancient artifacts before they end up in the wrong hands.

2.title: Edith
2.info-1: Edith (Working Title) is a first person game that combines visual novel elements with an interactable world.
